start_proposal.title: Start a new proposal
start_proposal.heading: Start a new proposal
start_proposal.intro_paragraph: Use this service to create a new funding proposal for a flood or coastal erosion risk management project.
start_proposal.before_you_start_intro: Over the next few pages we will ask you for key details about your project so we can create a proposal record for you.

project_name.heading: What is the project's name?
project_name.label: Project name
project_name.intro_paragraph: The project name should be meaningful and understandable and should not include abbreviations. For example, South Chesham River Colne Flood Alleviation Scheme or Clacton-on-Sea Coastal Erosion Project Phase 4.

errors.invalid_format: The project name must only contain letters, underscores, hyphens and numbers
errors.already_exists: The project name already exists. Your project must have a unique name.
errors.validation_error: An error occurred while validating the project name. Please try again.

rma_selection.heading: Which risk management authority is leading the proposal?
rma_selection.label: RMA Selection

errors.required: Select a lead risk management authority
